creditline: Gift of the Alfred K. Moir Trust
description: sketchy image of seated woman in profile from PL, with head turned slightly to her left, wearing a large hat and a patterned coat; face of second figure at left, ULQ; black and white
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Edition

see Signed
provenance: the artist, New Orleans (from 1963; gave/sold to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (until d. 2010; bequeathed to Condos); Barbara Moir Condos, Chevy Chase, Maryland (2010-12)
signed: LLC, in pencil: [The Brocade Coat (to Alfred con amore)]; LRC, in pencil: [S. Ferguson Gussow \'63]
title: The Brocade Coat
